name: Aging Room - Pelo de Oro - Scherzo
additionalNotes: The Aging Room Pelo de Oro Scherzo is a Nicaraguan cigar made by AJ Fernandez for Boutique Blends. First introduced in 2016, this full-bodied robusto grande features a gorgeous Nicaraguan Pelo de Oro wrapper, a difficult specimen to grow due to its fragile nature and obstacles in fermenting, but one that delivers a taste like no other. Along with that you'll find a premium Nicaraguan binder and more Pelo de Oro filler completing the package, making this puro another bonafide hit for the master of Nicaraguan tobacco.
